25 // TODO: Match the OP Mode to the actual value
26 // https://github.com/ROBOTIS-GIT/Dynamixel2Arduino/issues/73
27 enum OperatingMode{
28  OP_CURRENT = 0,
29  OP_VELOCITY = 1,
30  OP_POSITION = 3,
31  OP_EXTENDED_POSITION = 4,
32  OP_CURRENT_BASED_POSITION = 5,
33  OP_PWM = 16,
34 };

42 };
